entities.growthStrategySummary: Systran recently operated a change in its business strategy with the launch of complementary offers (Systran Translate Pro and Systran Model Studio) and will launch Systran Translate Enterprise targeted at SME’s. The launch of the Cloud offer is expected to drive €16m+ revenue in FY26BP, allowing the Group to significantly increase its EBITDA margin over the Business Plan.

entities.description: The transaction concerning Systran, for which financial advisors are appointed, referred to as 'the Transaction' in the document.
keyInvestmentHighlights: Acclaimed tech stack and unique portfolio of sensitive clients
Founded in 1968 and based in Paris, Systran is a pioneer and global leader in on-premise and cloud-based translation software

The Group has evolved continuously with breakthrough innovations and secured solutions, recently introducing Neural Machine Translation to corporate users via 3 offers: Systran Pure Neural® Software(“SPNS”), Systran Translate Pro and Systran Model Studio

Systran has successfully built a wide, diversified, loyal and growing customer across highly sensitive sectors: defense & security, technology & software, industry & services, e-commerce, language service providers and the public sector
The Group employs 108 people in 4 offices: Paris, San Diego, Tokyo and Daejeon
Systran has shown a solid track record of sustainable growth with a +11% CAGR over the FY19A-FY22B period
A unique opportunity to invest in a cutting edge neural machine translation software for sensitive clients
An expanding €760m machine translation market (+26% p.a.)
Unmatched offering of verified machine translation software
Pioneering use of new technologies
Systematic and validated support 1st-class services
Unique customer portfolio across highly sensitive sectors
An ambitious strategy to fuel further growth and explore new business segments
Resilient historical financials, paving the way for Systran’s global scale-up
solid track record of sustainable growth and strong resilience with a +11% CAGR over the FY19A-FY22B period
expected to generate a +29% CAGR over the FY22B-FY27BP period
change in its business strategy with the launch of complementary offers (Systran Translate Pro and Systran Model Studio)
launch Systran Translate Enterprise targeted at SME’s
launch of the Cloud offer is expected to drive €16m+ revenue in FY26BP, allowing the Group to significantly increase its EBITDA margin over the Business Plan
Attractive targets identified
Active lead
Experienced management team steering an organisation positioned for accelerated growth
dealRationaleHighlights: Experienced and dedicated management, recently reinforced to fuel further growth
Complementary management team steering an efficient organization positioned for continued growth
One-stop-shop for expert automated translation software solutions
Unique ability to pair 50+ common and rare languages into specific engine models
Wide language pairing catalogue covering very specific customer needs

entities.name: Systran Translate Enterprise
entities.description: Systran’s solution as a B2C Cloud SaaS, open to everyone, with online subscription, payment and configuration.

entities.name: Systran Model Studio
entities.description: The one and only solution in the world allowing data owners to train its translation engines using its own data resulting in an customized translation model; offered via cloud or on premise; Usually sold with SPNS
entities.pricingModelInfo: SPNS clients: Annual subscription composed of fixed fee, % of license fee and usage fee
